name: Rise of Zoulth
description:
Rebuild the Zoulth'An empire from nothing and rise again as their queen!

Rise of Zoulth is a tower offense strategy game, taking place on an alien planet.

Main Features
  • Consume: Siege cities and conquer planets, make the enemy troops your own.
  • Adapt: Change and improve your army and base. 
  • Overcome: Grow and expand your empire and ensure the survival of your race!
Controls

Rise of Zoulth is compatible with most standard computer keyboards and mouses. 

Select and display information: LMB

Move the Camera: WASD

Further Information

Rise of Zoulth was developed in the University Lusófona, third year (2020), Bachelor in Videogames. Credits:
